titleStmt.title: A true copie of the list, or roll, of the Kings Majesties most royall proceedings from the Tower through London to White-Hall, as it will be marshalled by the Lords deputed for the office of Earld. Marshall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Williams, in Jewen Street near Cripple-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
